name: Skia Saga
description:
Skia is a homunculus who practices alchemy, beings like him are very strange in the universe and as a good alchemist he goes around the world questioning himself and collecting ingredients in order to study the stone of duality and the omega stone, although this means that the benevolent and cheerful Skia stumbles over obstacles and has to finish them ...

ENJOY 40 LEVELS AND DISCOVER THE HISTORY OF A CITIZEN OF IXTEPIA

IT'S AN FPS / PLATFORM
